title: Did Merrick Garland Call Bill Barr a ‘Liar’ During Confirmation Hearing?
subtitle: A viral tweet purported to quote a tense exchange between Biden's attorney general nominee and Republican Sen. Tom Cotton.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: Merrick Garland called former U.S. Attorney General Bill Barr "a liar," or words to that effect, during a Senate hearing in February 2021.
